
{{Server client function}}
The function returns the UTF codes of the given string.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int utfCode ( string theString )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''theString:''' The [[/string.md|string]] to get the UTF code of.

===Returns===
Returns an ''[[/int.md|int]]'' if the function was successful, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<section name="Example" class="both" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local theString = "UTF code"
outputChatBox(utfCode (theString))
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
